791344980602286080.text: Free access to the Peruvian Legal Information System was implemented #YaWe start # 100Days

791344867146432517.text: The worker bonus in the SUNAT was changed. Prize for the extension of the base and not the highest amount raised #YaWe start # 100Days

791344808895909888.text: The services of SUNAT were simplified: Elimination of copies of DNIs for procedures, RUC by telephone, SUNAT Única for regions

791344767607209984.text: Electricity tariffs in rural areas were reduced from 18% to 68% #YaWe start # 100Day

791344492095934465.text: The relationship with Chile was re-launched #YaWe start # 100Days

791344443072843776.text: The effective political dialogue with China was reactivated #YaWe start # 100Days

791344387561295872.text: 50 control operations were carried out to enforce the intangibility of the 5 miles to eliminate trawling #YaWe start

791344347124002817.text: 8 Business Development Centers were set up, which will allow Mypes to establish themselves online #YaWe start # 100Days

791344075454767104.text: The Sierra Azul Program was launched #YaWe start # 100Days

791344021612494849.text: The national employment and employment promotion council was reactivated for the formality and productivity of labor rights #YaWe start

791343858181431300.text: The national debt was successfully refinanced, meaning an important saving for the country #YaWe start # 100Days

791343785703866376.text: The fifth tranche of the increase was extended to the policemen of Peru #YaWe start # 100Days

791343690325303296.text: The police / Serenazgo integrated patrol was implemented in Lima, Arequipa, La Libertad, Callao, among others #YaEmperemos

791343649560883200.text: Through the Rewards Program "they take care of themselves", the number of requisitions has increased to 626 and 65 offenders have been captured

791343336128933893.text: The satellite platform was put into operation to achieve the location of our archaeological remains #YaWe start # 100Days

791343265475878913.text: Julia Príncipe was appointed as President of the State Legal Defense Council #YaWe start # 100Days

791343035493806080.text: Five multisector intervention campaigns were carried out in VRAEM #YaWe start # 100Days

791342921593348096.text: The service capacity of Line 100 was expanded. With this action, 100% of care has been reached at the national level.

791342865423163392.text: S / .170 million were allocated for the Performance Stimulus Fund prioritized for the reduction of anemia and malnutrition

791342764189450240.text: The paving works of 1450 km of the National Road Network began. #YaWe start # 100Days

791342669591093252.text: The works of Line 2 of the Metro were unlocked and advanced. #YaWe start # 100Days

791342616562561024.text: The start of works for the Chincheros Airport was unlocked: Cusco. #YaWe start # 100Days

791342570681069568.text: Works of Modernization of the Port of San Martin in Pisco were unlocked. #YaWe start # 100Days

791342529090322432.text: The construction of the Red Vial 6: Chincha - Ica was unblocked. #YaWe start # 100Days

791342402313318400.text: A contest of 13 thousand places of directors and sub-directors was held to continue with the Educational Reform. #YaWe start # 100Days

791342272315027456.text: 170 Water and Sanitation works that will benefit one million Peruvians were invested and unlocked. #YaWe start # 100Days
